snippet: A Maine judge imposed certain conditions on an American nurse who treated Ebola patients in Sierra Leone but rejected a bid from state officials for more restrictive measures, her lawyer told Reuters....

headline.print_headline: Judge Imposes Conditions on Maine Nurse, Rejects Stricter Measures: Lawyer
headline.main: Judge Imposes Conditions on Maine Nurse, Rejects Stricter Measures: Lawyer

lead_paragraph: A Maine judge imposed certain conditions on an American nurse who treated Ebola patients in Sierra Leone but rejected a bid from state officials for more restrictive measures, her lawyer told Reuters.
